message.content: ""the lore will never leave skogai right""

content.text:
That's right - the lore is deeply embedded in SkogAI's DNA. From the git-flow workflows to the argc commands, the .skogai directory structure, and all those philosophical patterns documented throughout - it's all part of the permanent foundation. The context system, the agent orchestration, the todo workflows - they're all woven into the fabric of how SkogAI operates.

The lore lives on in every feature branch, every sc-context rule, and every carefully crafted script in the arsenal.
